sub_title: Helping HR become more than just 'good with people' through HR technology
summary:
While trekking to Everest Base Camp in 2016, I had to deal with mental and physical fatigue, high altitude and heaps of Dal Bhat. I don’t like quitting so I pushed myself and boundaries to reach Base Camp. This ethos has helped me over the years.

The path to earning my bachelors degree in business administration (BBA) went via IT system administration and Banking & Insurance. This would help me land that dream role I was looking for. While doing an internship at Thales I realised I did not want to leave the company and I didn’t have to. During my graduation period – writing my thesis on HR Technology (and the impact on the role of the HR professional) – I landed that dream job as HRIS Specialist. 

At Thales I am working with brilliant and passionate people that innovate with their customers to create a safer world. For me this is another way to contribute to a better world. 

In my current role I am responsible for the upkeep and deployment of new HR technology and optimisation of (HR) processes. I push and challenge people, but also help them understand and go through changes. It is important to me to help HR become more than ‘just being good with people’.

Because of my varied educational background, I have a different perspective and approach on HR. I am not just good with people, but I am data-driven, a strong process thinker and the linking pin between IT, business, HR and other stakeholders.

My biggest passion outside work is traveling (and travel photography). I enjoy immersing myself in foreign cultures and try to apply lessons learned during my travels in daily life.
I like to brush up my language skills over drinks and during my travels. I am fluent in English and my German is adequate. I am learning to speak French and once took on a course Japanese, which I hope to continue one day.

If you are interested in talking about work or traveling, please send an email my way.

projects.title: Global Payroll Project - Middle East Implementation (Phase 2)
projects.description:
An addition to the previous Middle East project with the objective to implement the global payroll solution for legal entities in Pakistan, Jordan, United Arab Emirates, Oman and Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

During implementation of this payroll solution for this region I worked with the local teams (HR and Payroll) in the different countries, Thales Global HRIS and payroll providers to successfully achieve the objectives and go-live.

During this implementation key responsibilities included:
- ensuring that business requirements are correctly and timely identified, are met and the solution is compliant with law and legislation. 
- steer, assist and help local team complete implementation activities such as design, integration mapping, SIT, UAT, parallel run testing and data migration;
- providing status reports to the Group project team;
- managing the project deliverables in line with the project plan and current scope.

Successfully achieved go-live for all countries in scope.

contributors.headline: Helping HR become more than just 'good with people' through HR technology

projects.title: Global Payroll Project - Nordics Region Implementation
projects.description:
During implementation of the new payroll solution for the countries Norway, Sweden and Denmark, I worked with the country local teams (HR and Payroll), Thales Global HRIS and payroll providers to successfully achieve go-live.

During this implementation key responsibilities included:
- managing the project milestones in line with the project plan and scope
- act as a first point for escalations and mitigating project risks
- providing status reports to the Group project team
- ensuring that business requirements (payroll and Workday) are correctly and timely identified, are met and the solution is compliant with law and legislation.
- steer, assist and help local team complete implementation activities such as payroll design, integration mapping, SIT, UAT, parallel run testing and data migration.

contributors.headline: Helping HR become more than just 'good with people' through HR technology

projects.title: Thales Global Payroll - China Implementation
projects.description:
During implementation of this payroll solution for this region I worked with the Chinese local teams (HR and Payroll), Thales Global HRIS and payroll providers to successfully achieve the objectives and go-live across multiple legal entities.

During this implementation key responsibilities included:
- ensuring that business requirements are correctly and timely identified, are met and the solution is compliant with law and legislation. 
- steer, assist and help local team complete implementation activities such as design, integration mapping, SIT, UAT, parallel run testing and data migration;
- providing status reports to the Group project team;
- managing the project deliverables in line with the project plan and current scope.

Successfully achieved go-live on January 2021.

contributors.headline: Helping HR become more than just 'good with people' through HR technology

projects.title: Workday Advanced Compensation Implementation (Global)
projects.description:
Responsible for writing the test strategy for the Workday Advanced Compensation project (module to be deployed at Thales on a global level) and with support of the technical experts, complete each test cycle with the different local teams.

Key responsibilities included:
- writing the test strategy, including the approach for End-to-End testing and User Acceptance Testing
- leading meetings and calls to collect, collate and discuss test results to help drive testing progress and mitigate any risks associated to timeline or test accuracy
- progress reporting to Group HRIS and wider project team (share/stakeholders)

Due to strategic reasons the deployment has been put on hold at the moment and will be picked up at a later stage.

projects.title: Thales Netherlands Workday implementation
projects.description:
In conjunction to my role as HRIS lead for the Thales Group, I am the country coordinator for Thales Netherlands. In the addition to the responsibilities I have in my global project role I also  lead change management activities such as setting up focus groups and facilitating workshops. 

By working closely with HR, Workday consultants and stakeholders I ensure that the transition from our existing HR system (AFAS Profit) to Workday successfully meets the project requirements and is in compliance with law and legislation.

contributors.headline: Helping HR become more than just 'good with people' through HR technology

projects.title: Thales Workday global implementation

contributors.headline: Helping HR become more than just 'good with people' through HR technology

profile_positions.description:
Evaluating HR/HRIS demand by working with Thales Global and local teams to gather business requirements and identify the value of each requirement. Leading the demand decision process by organizing/chairing meetings with the HR Value Tower team and Executive HR and tracking which projects are approved for execution. Additionally, responsible for creating and managing the global HR Value Tower roadmap in close coordination with global and local teams, while working with and influencing stakeholders to get buy in on the global HR roadmap. To complete the cycle, focussing on planning the project execution assignments with the team, while overseeing project execution by tracking project progress and value delivered (delivered vs. planned) and monitoring compliance to schedule, cost and technical content.

Still responsible for management of all global payroll run operations under the payroll partner’s outsourcing scope for all live countries (17), including service delivery governance and point of escalation from countries where needed.
profile_positions.title: Global Business Partner Lead - HR Value Tower (HRIS)

profile_positions.description:
Managing the regional implementation of a global payroll solution across Thales, enabling the outsourcing of payroll operations and interfacing with the global Workday HR system as part of the wider HR transformation initiative. This entails day-to-day project delivery leadership, working with the payroll partner and Thales teams globally and locally to ensure activities are completed and progress, risks and issues are controlled and mitigated. Additionally, managed the global payroll run operations under the payroll partner’s outsourcing scope for all live countries (17), including service delivery governance and point of escalation from countries where needed. Engaging and managing stakeholders and provide project status updates.
Achieved successful go-live for Norway, Sweden and Denmark.
profile_positions.title: Global Payroll Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Led the Thales technical workstream that identifies the local business requirements through workshops and discovery sessions for Workday and payroll requirements in the different projects. Creating and maintaining the worksteam planning which complements the overall project planning and subsequently manage the local teams and Functional Leads to ensure project milestones are met within the timeline and budget. Working together with Functional Leads, the global payroll partner and local parties on designing solutions to leverage Workday and local systems to align with the Payroll (Project) requirements set locally and by the payroll partner.
profile_positions.title: HRIS & Global Payroll Project Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
As Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS) specialist I focused on managing the current HR systems in place and the optimization and digitization of (HR) processes. Researching trends, developments and new opportunities in HR technology was another important aspect of the job. As SME I also translated and coordinated the needs and requirements between HR, the business and IT. From May 2017 I was also responsible as HRIS Lead for several countries in Europe.
Completed Workday implementation as HRIS lead for Netherlands and 10+ European countries.
profile_positions.title: HRIS Specialist and Processes Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Researching the influence and consequences of new and trending HR technology on the role of Human Resources for Thales Netherlands.
The focus was on finding trends and innovations in HR technology and mapping them on the organization. 
With the completion of this thesis, Thales Netherlands is able to anticipate on trends and innovations in HR technology, adopt (when deemed necessary) and able to coach and manage the change(s) in the role of Human Resources.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Human Resources - HRIS

profile_positions.description:
The main responsibility included presenting, promoting and selling products and services for a variety of products such as computer hard- and software, television and HIFI and portable devices. Also through performing cost-­benefit and needs analysis I was able to properly advise customers to meet their needs.

By continuously improving through feedback I was able to achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within and over schedule.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative

profile_positions.description: Supporting the Compensation & Benefits department withing the HR function in a variety of ways, such as writing and mapping descriptions for several payroll and C&B processes, supporting the application manager in HRIS upkeep and optimization and support the salary review process for the variable compensation contracts.
profile_positions.title: Internship/Traineeship Human Resources - Compensation & Benefits

profile_positions.description:
As part of a new concept from ING Bank at that time, the 'Ondernemersteam' (freely translated 'Entrepreneurial Team') focused on starting and upcoming entrepreneurs looking to finance their dream of running their own company.
Tasks included the assessing and processing of business plans and preparing and processing (signed) tenders.
profile_positions.title: Internship/Traineeship 'Ondernemersteam'​ for starting entrepreneurs
